channel.title: Quest (titles are required to be 15 characters long)
channel.description:
***The sessions will be recorded, uploaded publicly to YouTube and converted into an audio-only format; by signing up for a session, you agree to be recorded and for the recording to be used in this way.***
![image|690x418](upload://a0gIjTAEVytvxwyiOCNPQzdFbYk.jpeg)
Your story begins on the island of Draenor, a land devastated by magic. From the chasm of Clodiff to the crumbling ruins of Calcarias, you'll find disciples on a sacred mission. In this world, magic is outlawed, danger is mundane and daily life is always a risk. People here are hopeful that their families will return, but a plague is spreading.
These are four sessions of [*Quest*](https://www.adventure.game/) by T.C. Sottek. Being able to attend every session is ideal, but not required. You must sign up for each session you wish to attend.
We’ll use [Zoom](https://www.zoom.us/) (you shouldn’t need to download the application if you don’t want) and [Google Sheets](https://sheets.google.com/). I’ll email players about a week before this session with the necessary information.
**Safety Tools:** We will use [Script Change](https://briebeau.com/thoughty/script-change/) and [Lines and Veils](https://rpg.stackexchange.com/questions/30906/what-do-the-terms-lines-and-veils-mean). We will adhere to the [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
**[date=2020-05-04 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M3mfJ3Ec8NaURBx2h3Q **[date=2020-05-11 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M3mfRpCI5Mr-Drj-KU0 **[date=2020-05-18 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M3mfZUiOtE9CnuCtYB_ **[date=2020-05-25 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M3mfeKAz0jcvN1fgkpv

item.description:
@darren wrote:

The sessions will be recorded, uploaded publicly to YouTube and converted into an audio-only format; by signing up for a session, you agree to be recorded and for the recording to be used in this way.

image2689×1632 2.51 MB

Your story begins on the island of Draenor, a land devastated by magic. From the chasm of Clodiff to the crumbling ruins of Calcarias, you’ll find disciples on a sacred mission. In this world, magic is outlawed, danger is mundane and daily life is always a risk. People here are hopeful that their families will return, but a plague is spreading.

These are four sessions of Quest by T.C. Sottek. Being able to attend every session is ideal, but not required. You must sign up for each session you wish to attend.

We’ll use Zoom (you shouldn’t need to download the application if you don’t want) and Google Sheets. I’ll email players about a week before this session with the necessary information.

Safety Tools: We will use Script Change and Lines and Veils. We will adhere to the Community Code of Conduct.
